attributes.action: Grant Visas for Ukrainians who are family members of UK Citizens and Residents
attributes.additional_details:
I am UK Residents and spent all my adult life in the UK. I haven't been able to sleep for 2 days now because my family back in the Ukraine is hiding from bombs and bullets. My father is determine to stay in the Ukraine and fight to defend his country, but my mother and little sister have to hide. 

I want this petition to help Ukrainian people in the UK, who are now either British citizens or UK Residents and who have worked hard to bring value to the county, to get British government to grant an emergency Visa for their immediate family to enter UK.
attributes.background: I would like to ask UK Government to grant emergency visas for the Ukrainians who are immediate family members of the UK Citizens and Residents.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609397

We have also published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Wave visa requirement for Ukrainian refugees: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609530

Offer fast track asylum to any Ukrainians displaced due to the invasion: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609382
